name: Amonkhet Mega
description: A huge package covering Amonkhet-era mechanics: Embalm, Exert, Aftermath (split support via rules text), Cycling, -1/-1 counters, Cartouches & Trials, Deserts & desert-matters, Brick counters, and more. Includes broad color-weighted templates, adlib token pools, creature subtypes, and suggested evergreen keywords.

Creature: Vigilance. {TRIGGER_INTRO} you put one or more -1/-1 counters on a creature, {WHITE_PAYOFF}.
You may exert this creature as it attacks. {EXERT_REWARD_WHITE}. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
Embalm {EMBALM_COST}.
When {SELF} enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls.
Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control a Desert.
When {SELF} enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_WHITE}.
Lifelink. {TRIGGER_INTRO} you cycle or discard a card, you gain 1 life.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} {SELF} attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
Instant: Tap up to two target creatures. Prevent all damage those creatures would deal this turn.
Exile target attacking or blocking creature with mana value {MV_OR_LESS}.
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. If it was exerted, instead it gets +3/+3 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
Create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens. If you control a Desert, create three instead.
Sorcery: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to two target creatures. Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token for each counter put this way.
Return target Trial card you control to its owner's hand. Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token, then Scry 1.
Search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Cycling {CYCLING_COST}.
Enchantment: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you put one or more -1/-1 counters on creatures this turn, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.
Artifact: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_WHITE}.
When {SELF} enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert, you gain 3 life.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance. {EQUIP_TEXT}
Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever you exert equipped creature, scry 1. {EQUIP_TEXT}
AuraCreature: Cartouche — Enchant creature. When {SELF} enters the battlefield, {CARTOUCHE_WHITE_ETB}. {TRIAL_RETURN}. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

Creature: Flying. You may exert this creature as it attacks. When you do, {EXERT_REWARD_BLUE}. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
Embalm {EMBALM_COST}.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} you cycle or discard a card, scry 1.
When {SELF} enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Prowess. {TRIGGER_INTRO} you cast a noncreature spell, {BLUE_PAYOFF}.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_BLUE}.
Instant: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {TAX}. Cycling {CYCLING_COST}.
Return target tapped creature to its owner's hand. If that creature was exerted, draw a card.
Tap up to two target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Draw two cards. Then discard a card. Cycling {CYCLING_COST}.
Sorcery: Aftermath — Cast this spell only from your graveyard, then exile it. {AFTERMATH_BLUE_TEXT}
Put a -1/-1 counter on up to two target creatures. Draw a card for each creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.
Search your library for up to two Desert cards, reveal them, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your end step, if you cycled or discarded two or more cards this turn, draw a card.
Artifact: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_BLUE}.
When {SELF} enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has 'Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.' {EQUIP_TEXT}
AuraCreature: Cartouche — Enchant creature. When {SELF} enters the battlefield, {CARTOUCHE_BLUE_ETB}. {TRIAL_RETURN}. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

Creature: Menace. When {SELF} enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature you control.
You may exert this creature as it attacks. When you do, {EXERT_REWARD_BLACK}. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
Embalm {EMBALM_COST}.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} you cycle or discard a card, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, {BLACK_PAYOFF}.
{ACTIVATED_COST}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_BLACK}.
Instant: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If it has a -1/-1 counter on it, destroy it instead.
Destroy target creature with mana value {MV_OR_LESS}. Cycling {CYCLING_COST}.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it has embalm, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped instead.
Sorcery: Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature. You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Aftermath — Cast this spell only from your graveyard, then exile it. {AFTERMATH_BLACK_TEXT}
Each player discards a card. If a player discards a creature card this way, that player loses 2 life.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life if they control a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.
Artifact: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_BLACK}.
{TAP}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has menace. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. {EQUIP_TEXT}
AuraCreature: Cartouche — Enchant creature. When {SELF} enters the battlefield, {CARTOUCHE_BLACK_ETB}. {TRIAL_RETURN}. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has menace.

Creature: Haste. You may exert this creature as it attacks. When you do, {EXERT_REWARD_RED}. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} you cycle or discard a card, {RED_CYCLING_TRIGGER}.
When {SELF} enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature you control. If you do, {RED_PAYOFF_MINUS}.
Embalm {EMBALM_COST}.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_RED}.
Instant: {SELF} deals 3 damage to any target. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Target attacking creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If it was exerted, it gains first strike until end of turn.
Sorcery: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards. If you control a Desert, add {R}.
Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature. {SELF} deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
Aftermath — Cast this spell only from your graveyard, then exile it. {AFTERMATH_RED_TEXT}
Enchantment: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you exerted a creature this turn, {RED_EXERT_PAYOFF}.
Artifact: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_RED}.
{TAP}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike as long as it's attacking. {EQUIP_TEXT}
AuraCreature: Cartouche — Enchant creature. When {SELF} enters the battlefield, {CARTOUCHE_RED_ETB}. {TRIAL_RETURN}. Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike.

Creature: Trample. You may exert this creature as it attacks. When you do, {EXERT_REWARD_GREEN}. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
When {SELF} enters the battlefield, distribute two -1/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} you cycle or discard a card, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Embalm {EMBALM_COST}.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_GREEN}.
Instant: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If you control a Desert, that creature also gains trample until end of turn.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cycling {CYCLING_COST}.
Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature, then untap up to two lands.
Sorcery: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle. Cycling {CYCLING_COST}.
Aftermath — Cast this spell only from your graveyard, then exile it. {AFTERMATH_GREEN_TEXT}
Enchantment: Creatures you control have 'Whenever this creature becomes exerted, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.'
Artifact: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_GREEN}.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Whenever you cycle a card, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. {EQUIP_TEXT}
AuraCreature: Cartouche — Enchant creature. When {SELF} enters the battlefield, {CARTOUCHE_GREEN_ETB}. {TRIAL_RETURN}. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

Artifact: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Put a brick counter on {SELF}. Then {BRICK_EFFECT_COLORLESS}.
{TAP}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast embalm or Aftermath spells, or to activate embalm abilities.

Creature: You may exert this creature as it attacks. When you do, {EXERT_GENERIC_REWARD}. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} you cycle or discard a card, {GENERIC_CYCLING_TRIGGER}.
Embalm {EMBALM_COST}.
Sorcery: Aftermath — Cast this spell only from your graveyard, then exile it. {AFTERMATH_GENERIC_TEXT}
AuraCreature: Cartouche — Enchant creature. When {SELF} enters the battlefield, {CARTOUCHE_GENERIC_ETB}. {TRIAL_RETURN}. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

WHITE_PAYOFF: create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token
tap target creature an opponent controls
BLUE_PAYOFF: untap up to one target creature
target creature gains flying until end of turn
BLACK_PAYOFF: each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life
return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand
create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token
RED_PAYOFF_MINUS: target creature gains haste until end of turn
WHITE_CYCLING_TRIGGER: tap up to one target creature
RED_CYCLING_TRIGGER: target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn
EXERT_REWARD_WHITE: tap up to one target creature
it gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn
EXERT_REWARD_BLUE: tap up to one target creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step
EXERT_REWARD_BLACK: target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life
destroy target creature with mana value 2 or less
EXERT_REWARD_GREEN: target creature you control gains trample until end of turn
EXERT_GENERIC_REWARD: it gets +1/+1 until end of turn
it deals 1 damage to any target
AFTERMATH_BLUE_TEXT: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
AFTERMATH_BLACK_TEXT: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. You lose 2 life.
AFTERMATH_RED_TEXT: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
AFTERMATH_GREEN_TEXT: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
TRIAL_BOUNCE: When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return {SELF} to its owner's hand.
TRIAL_RETURN: Return a Trial you control to its owner's hand.
TRIAL_WHITE_ETB: tap up to two target creatures your opponents control
create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens
TRIAL_BLUE_ETB: return target creature to its owner's hand
TRIAL_RED_ETB: creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn
TRIAL_GREEN_ETB: search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle
creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn
CARTOUCHE_WHITE_ETB: exile target creature an opponent controls until {SELF} leaves the battlefield
create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token
CARTOUCHE_BLUE_ETB: return target creature to its owner's hand
CARTOUCHE_BLACK_ETB: destroy target creature with mana value 2 or less
CARTOUCHE_RED_ETB: target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn
CARTOUCHE_GREEN_ETB: target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn
create a 3/3 green Beast creature token
DESERT_ABILITY_WHITE: {TAP}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
DESERT_ABILITY_BLUE: {TAP}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with cycling.
DESERT_ABILITY_BLACK: {TAP}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate only if you have a creature card in your graveyard.
{TAP}: Add {B}. Spend this mana only to cast embalm or Aftermath spells.
DESERT_ABILITY_RED: {TAP}: {SELF} deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. Activate only as a sorcery.
{TAP}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
DESERT_ABILITY_GREEN: {TAP}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only if you control a Desert.
{TAP}: Add {G}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
DESERT_ABILITY_COLORLESS: {TAP}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only if you control a Desert.
DESERT_SAC_WHITE: {1}, {TAP}, Sacrifice a Desert: Tap up to two target creatures.
DESERT_SAC_BLUE: {1}, {TAP}, Sacrifice a Desert: Draw a card.
DESERT_SAC_BLACK: {1}, {TAP}, Sacrifice a Desert: Target opponent discards a card.
DESERT_SAC_RED: {1}, {TAP}, Sacrifice a Desert: {SELF} deals 2 damage to any target.
DESERT_SAC_GREEN: {1}, {TAP}, Sacrifice a Desert: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures.
BRICK_EFFECT_WHITE: if there are three or more brick counters on {SELF}, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token
gain 3 life. If there are three or more brick counters on {SELF}, gain 6 life instead
BRICK_EFFECT_BLUE: draw a card. If there are three or more brick counters on {SELF}, scry 2 first
if there are three or more brick counters on {SELF}, tap up to two target creatures
BRICK_EFFECT_BLACK: each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. If there are three or more brick counters on {SELF}, instead each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life
BRICK_EFFECT_RED: {SELF} deals 1 damage to any target. If there are three or more brick counters on {SELF}, it deals 2 damage instead
BRICK_EFFECT_GREEN: target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If there are three or more brick counters on {SELF}, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead
BRICK_EFFECT_COLORLESS: add {C}{C}. If there are three or more brick counters on {SELF}, add one mana of any color instead
